title: Michael Matthews Relegated Off Tour of Flanders Podium in Controversial Ruling
content:
Nils Politt moves into third-place following jury decision, and the Australian is relegated to 11th in the Belgian monument: 'We don't feel like it was a clear-cut case.'

Read the full article at Michael Matthews Relegated Off Tour of Flanders Podium in Controversial Ruling on Velo.
author: ahood
